data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Guarda, Portugal a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Guarda, Portugal
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Guarda to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.section_summary: On average, 14 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Guarda, Portugal.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, to the people of Guarda you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Guarda.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the South Asian, general people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the South Asian, general people.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Guarda who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Guarda.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Guarda against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.
